summary: This is an automatic email notification from the U.S. District Court for the District of New Hampshire regarding a removal hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell held on July 2, 2020. The document notes the defendant waived an in-court hearing and identity hearing, with a detention hearing to be held in the prosecuting district.

connections.description: Lawrence Vogelman is listed as the defense attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell during her removal hearing.
Magistrate Judge Andrea K. Johnstone presided over Ghislaine Maxwell's removal hearing.

events.title: Removal Hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A removal hearing was held for Ghislaine Maxwell before Magistrate Judge Andrea K. Johnstone. The defendant waived an in-court hearing and identity hearing, with a detention hearing to be held in the prosecuting district.

locations: U.S. District Court District of New Hampshire
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell waived an in-court hearing and identity hearing during her removal hearing on July 2, 2020.
The detention hearing for Maxwell was scheduled to be held in the prosecuting district, not in New Hampshire.
The hearing was brief, lasting only 17 minutes according to the minute entry.
The document is an automatic notification from the court's electronic filing system regarding case activity.
